meanings.definition: Extremely small in size or scale.
meanings.sent1: The ultramicro organism could only be seen under a powerful microscope.
meanings.sent2: The ultramicro details on the tiny painting were hard to appreciate without a magnifying glass.
meanings.sent3: The ultramicro ants were so small, they could fit on the head of a pin!
meanings.sent4: Her ultramicro voice was barely audible over the loud music.
meanings.sent5: The ultramicro stars twinkled faintly in the vast night sky.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to or involving objects or particles that are of microscopic size.
meanings.sent1: The ultramicro particles in the air were too small to be seen by the naked eye.
meanings.sent2: The ultramicro technology allowed scientists to study the tiniest components of cells.
meanings.sent3: The ultramicro dust particles danced in the sunlight like glitter.
meanings.sent4: Her ultramicro jewelry collection was so delicate and intricate.
meanings.sent5: The ultramicro bacteria spread quickly through the water supply.
